description: AWS Route53 Recovery Readiness Recovery Group Schema and API specifications.

RecoveryGroupName.description: The name of the recovery group to create.
RecoveryGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of the recovery group to create.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Cells.description: A list of the cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the recovery group.
Cells.markdownDescription:
A list of the cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the recovery group.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

RecoveryGroupArn.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource.
RecoveryGroupArn.markdownDescription:
A collection of tags associated with a resource.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 256   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A collection of tags associated with a resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
